actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

official_title: A bill to repeal titles XV (relating to health planning) and XVI (relating to health resources development) of the Public Health Service Act.

summary.text: Repeals title XV (National Health Planning and Development) and title XVI (Health Resources Development) of the Public Health Service Act. Provides that such repeals shall not affect outstanding loan obligations. Establishes 20 year Federal recovery rights on facilities receiving title XVI construction grants.

titles.title: A bill to repeal titles XV (relating to health planning) and XVI (relating to health resources development) of the Public Health Service Act.
